outputs.output_descr: This activity aims to stimulate and disseminate best practices in local environmental governance and community involvement in resource management.   Together with their communities, local governments will promote a new energy culture, sustainable consumption and improved adaptive capacity.  Stakeholders will assess the governance obstacles to implementing responsibilities related to climate change at the local level.

project_descr: With its implementing partner, the Network of Associations of Local Authorities of Southeast Europe (NALAS), this regional program involves local governments and local communities in addressing climate change challenges.
